name: Toast Stack
description:
Tower building game but it's a sandwich! Stack ingridients on one another and make the biggest sandwich you can make. It's free and it features ads.

I'm uploading the game here because of the API requirements on google play.

I myself cannot download the game from google play and this version here is targeted for API 28+ while the one on the google play is API 31+

Current version is 1.1. I will be updating the version when i do it on google play.

Enjoy!
